test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-dateTime-equal2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:06 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:dateTime-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dateTime(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dateTime(lower bound) *******************************************************

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-001
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:two-digit($number as xs:integer) { let $string := string($number) return if (string-length($string) lt 2) then concat('0', $string) else $string }; declare function local:dateTime($year as xs:integer, $month as xs:integer, $day as xs:integer) { let $m := local:two-digit($month), $d := local:two-digit($day) return xs:dateTime(concat($year, '-', $m, '-', $d, "T12:00:00")) }; not(local:dateTime(2008, 05, 12) eq xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-002
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-003
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-005
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-006
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:two-digit($number as xs:integer) { let $string := string($number) return if (string-length($string) lt 2) then concat('0', $string) else $string }; declare function local:dateTime($year as xs:integer, $month as xs:integer, $day as xs:integer) { let $m := local:two-digit($month), $d := local:two-digit($day) return xs:dateTime(concat($year, '-', $m, '-', $d, "T12:00:00")) }; not(local:dateTime(2008, 05, 12) ne xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-011
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; exists(local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:true()) eq xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-012
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:false()) eq xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00")

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-013
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; exists(local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:true()) ne xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-014
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:dateTime, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dateTime }; local:dateTime(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00"), fn:false()) ne xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T12:00:00")

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-015
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:dateTime( concat($dateTime, $timezone) ) }; adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(local:dateTime("1972-12-14T00:00:00", "-12:00")) eq adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T00:00:00+12:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-016
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
test-case.test: declare function local:dateTime($dateTime as xs:string, $timezone as xs:string) { xs:dateTime( concat($dateTime, $timezone) ) }; adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(local:dateTime("1972-12-14T00:00:00", "-12:00")) ne adjust-dateTime-to-timezone(xs:dateTime("1972-12-15T00:00:00+12:00"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-017
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime

test-case.name: cbcl-dateTime-equal-018
test-case.description: test comparison of dateTime
